## Program.call() method

Call a function on this program

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
call(functionName: string, args: {
        accounts: Record<string, string>;
        data?: any[];
        signers?: Signer[];
    }): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  functionName | string | Name of the function to call |
|  args | { accounts: Record&lt;string, string&gt;; data?: any\[\]; signers?: Signer\[\]; } | Arguments to pass to the function including accounts, data, and signers |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

result of the contract call

## Example


```jsx
const counterAccount = Keypair.generate();
await program.call("increment", {
  accounts: {
    counterAccount: counterAccount.publicKey.toBase58(),
  },
  data: ["..."],
  signers: [counterAccount]
})
```
